Package com.example.pigeon_party_app

package com.example.pigeon_party_app
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminEventArrayAdapter
    This array adapter allows the admin to view events in the browse admin fragment
    AdminFragment
    This fragment allows us to see the main page for our admin and from there the admin can select what he wants to do
    AdminUserArrayAdapter
    This class adapts our array for users when we want to browse profiles
    AvatarView
    This class creates a default avatar with the user's first initial or sets the avatar to their profile picture if they have uploaded one Based on AvatarView - Custom Implementation of ImageView, Muthu Raj: https://medium.com/android-news/avatarview-custom-implementation-of-imageview-4bcf0714d09d
    BrowseEventsFragment
    This fragment handles our browsing events for our admin class and removing events
    BrowseImagesFragment
    This fragment allows the admin to browse events and remove them
    BrowseProfilesFragment
    This fragment allows us to browse profiles and remove them
    CreateEntrantProfileFragment
    This class is a fragment that allows app users to create a profile with their information
    CreateEventFragment
    This is a fragment in which the user can create an event
    EditEntrantProfileFragment
    This class is a fragment that allows the user to change their profile information
    EditEventFragment
    This fragment allows an organizer to edit their existing event
    EditFacilityFragment
    The fragment which allows the user to manage their facility
    EnrolledEntrantsFragment
    This fragment shows the final list of participants selected for an event
    EntrantArrayAdapter
     
    EntrantListFragment
     
    EntrantMapFragment
    This fragment is used to show a map of entrants sign up location
    Event
    This class is used to create events
    EventDetailsFragment
    This class is a fragment that shows the user event details after the user scans the QR Code, also allows the user to sign up for the event if the waitlist is not full
    EventsArrayAdapter
    This class is used to show a list of users events on main activity
    Facility
    The facility class represents the facility which an organizer hosts their events
    FacilityFragment
    Fragment which prompts the user for initial facility creation in order to create events
    ImageArrayAdapter
    This class is used to put images in the listview for admins
    MainActivity
    This is the main activity which serves as the home screen of the app
    NotificationHelper
    This class aids in sending notifications to Users
    OrganizerArrayAdapter
    This is a class that allows the event organizer to view a list of their events
    OrganizerFragment
    This fragment is the main page for all organizer functions (creating events, viewing/editing events)
    SendNotificationsFragment
    A simple dialog fragment that allows an organizer to choose which participants to send a notification to for a certain event.
    User
    This class is used to create and manage users
    Validator
    Purpose: this is to ensure the user input is valid.
    ViewEntrantProfileFragment
    This class is a fragment that allows the user to view their profile and has a button to take them to an edit fragment
